page.title: 04EASTBOURNE BY THE MAYOR
page.content:
As Mayor I am the Queen's Representative and also Chairman of the Council. What I enjoy most about my job is meeting people.In the course of my work as Mayor I meet many people every week. I think Eastbourne is a beautiful town,on one side it is surrounded by the South Downs,and on the other by the English Channel,so it has a natural beauty.Added to this consecutive councils have taken great care to protect this natural beauty. The parks and gardens of Eastbourne are admired by all who see them,and in 1983 the town won the Entente Florale competition.
Councillor L. Mason.
